preconditions: User is at the login page (https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login)
User has a valid username and password
main_flow: User enters valid username (tomsmith) and password (SuperSecretPassword!)
System verifies the entered credentials against the database
4. If credentials are valid, system displays success message and grants access to secure area
5. User can now interact with the secure area
b. User can retry entering the credentials
postconditions: System grants access to secure area upon successful login
User is able to interact with the secure area
User can logout from the secure area at any time.
